sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Andrewes Golden chaine to linke the penitent sinner unto Almighty God richly adorned with ornaments of Holy Scripture ... : newly made in a godly prayer taken out of the pure fountaine of Holy Scripture, very necessary to cure the sick soule of a sinner, and to draw him from desperation, if with a beleeving faith he will daily use it in prayer unto Almighty God. Andrewes, John, fl. 1615.
[18] p.
Printed for Iohn Wright, London : 1645.
"Candido lectori" signed: Iohn Andrewes. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
Andrewes Golden chaine to linke the penitent sinner unto Almighty God richly adorned with ornaments of Holy Scripture ... : newly made in a godly prayer taken out of the pure fountaine of Holy Scripture, very necessary to cure the sick soule of a sinner, and to draw him from desperation, if with a beleeving faith he will daily use it in prayer unto Almighty God. Andrewes, John, fl. 1615.
[18] p.
Printed for Iohn Wright, London : 1645.
"Candido lectori" signed: Iohn Andrewes. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
